word: H3518 - כָּבָה - kâbâh - kaw-baw' - Go out - வெளியே போ

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Go out / வெளியே போ
to quench, to put out, to be put out, to be quenched, to be extinguished
a) (Qal) to be quenched, to be extinguished
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to expire or (causatively) to extinguish (fire, light, anger): - go (put) out, quench.
Cognate: H3518, H3521
